mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc
select b.no, b.title, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by no desc
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and title like '%'||#{value}||'%' order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values ( seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName, b.content from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
